summary: Comprehensive testing of Mathallen Malm√∂ website completed successfully. Backend API testing achieved 90% success rate with all core functionality working. Frontend testing confirmed all pages load correctly, admin authentication works, contact form submits successfully, and UI displays properly in Swedish with orange/yellow branding.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 'Admin already exists' when admin user already created
minor_issues.impact: None - expected behavior since admin was pre-created

minor_issues.issue: Some stat cards not found via data-testid during testing
minor_issues.impact: Visual display works but automated testing selectors may need adjustment

passed_tests: Homepage loads with Swedish content and hero section
Admin dashboard functionality and offer creation
Contact form submission and success message display
Offer management (create, list, current week offers)
